snippet: The Miami Heat have won 12 straight playoff games following a loss, a streak they will need to keep alive on Sunday to avoid going into an ominous 0-2 hole against the San Antonio Spurs in the NBA Finals....

headline.print_headline: Heat Look to Bounce Back Against Spurs and Keep Streak Going
headline.main: Heat Look to Bounce Back Against Spurs and Keep Streak Going

lead_paragraph: The Miami Heat have won 12 straight playoff games following a loss, a streak they will need to keep alive on Sunday to avoid going into an ominous 0-2 hole against the San Antonio Spurs in the NBA Finals.
